summary: Diff appears to implement the requested presentation updates: menu item cards no longer show food photos, logo references updated to the new transparent-fixed assets in header/hero, favicon updated, and muted text color tokens brightened. However, the diff summary also indicates several unrelated/unrequested structural and content changes (e.g., filtering/removing the “Deals” category, rewriting menu image paths to 4K helpers, adding new section-visibility/navigation behavior, and adding placeholder hooks/config changes).

hallucinated_features.description: Filtering/removing the “Deals” menu category (content change) even though the request specified keeping existing menu item names/prices/categories unchanged.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to hide photos and adjust styling; altering categories is out of scope and may violate constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Updating business menu image paths to Ultra HD/4K via a helper function (content/config change) despite the request being presentation-only and explicitly a non-goal to regenerate/add new food photos.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; the requirement was to hide/remove images from UI, not to change menu image assets/paths.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/content/business.ts: "updated to use Ultra HD 4K resolution paths for all menu item images via the getMenuItemImage helper function")

hallucinated_features.description: Changing section mounting/navigation behavior by introducing mutually-exclusive revealable sections and scroll-to-top switching behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicit non-goal: do not add new site sections or change section navigation behavior.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/hooks/useRevealableSections.ts: "managing mutually-exclusive section visibility including 'home' as default, with instant scroll-to-top behavior")

hallucinated_features.description: Adding a placeholder React Query hooks file.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and introduces new scaffolding unrelated to hiding photos/logo transparency/text color tweaks.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: "Placeholder file for future React Query hooks")

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind and PostCSS build configuration changes (CommonJS conversion and new postcss.config.cjs).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; may be valid refactoring but is out of scope for the specified UI-only changes.
